item.description:
Min/Max: Min of 4, Max of 20 members

Event Fees: $2 event fee
Annual Members - FREE
Guests: $2 event fee

Each string = $3.75 per person
Shoes = $2.00 per person


Details:

Hello Everyone -

With the change in seasons we're also shifting gears with event selections on the calendar for the fall/winter season activities. So how about trying your hand at a night of bowling? We're planning to meet Friday, October 23rd at 8:30 for some Candlepin bowling at Timber Lanes in Abington. Please plan to meet about 10 mins early to get shoes and schedule teams.

There is a minimum of 4 Participants (Non-organizers) by noon on Thursday, October 22th.

Organizers: Susan (AO)

Please Note:

SSFMG and its organizers are not responsible for any injuries to participants or damage to equipment.

Carpool: There is no carpool for this event. Members should meet at Timber Lanes Bowling in Abington. If you would like to carpool you may note where from in your RSVP comment and someone else may choose to contact you if they are also interested in carpooling.

RSVP Deadline: Thursday, October 22th @ 12:00 PM. Any changes made after this time may not be seen by an Event Organizer. Changes to No after this point will be considered No-Shows per our guidelines on the About Us page.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions
